text: The Maritime Museum in Malacca City, Malacca, Malaysia, is about maritime activities. It was officially opened by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad on 13 June 1994. The second phase of the museum, in the old Guthrie building, was opened by State Committee Chairman Poh Ah Tiam on 23 May 1998. ==References== Category:1994 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Malaysia Category:Museums in Malaysia Category:Buildings and structures in Malacca Category:Malacca City
title: Maritime Museum (Malaysia)
